rules.title: Back up your base(s)
rules.detail: Use the Base Reconstruction Tool. Unbacked bases are left behind.

rules.title: Back up your vehicles
rules.detail: Use the Vehicle Backup Tool. Disassemble extras if needed.

rules.title: Store valuables in inventory or bank
rules.detail: Inventory, bank contents and Solari transfer.

rules.title: Cancel marketplace listings
rules.detail: Items left listed do not transfer.

rules.title: Be in Hagga Basin
rules.detail: Transfer can only start from Hagga Basin.

rules.title: Confirm transfer token and cooldown
rules.detail: 1 token every 7 days. Return transfer also costs a token.
